ygData.subject: Re: SV: [EverQuest] Verant's new security policy..
ygData.msgSnippet: You would be surprised. Why would someone put a virus on another person s computer to destroy all data or ruin things for them? Why would someone rape an
ygData.messageBody:
You would be surprised. Why would someone put a virus on another person's
computer to destroy all data or ruin things for them? Why would someone rape
an infant? Bc some people are just sick twisted creepozoids. They get their
jollies from screwing with other people and making them miserable.
I know someone who thinks it's funny for EQ players to get screwed. EQ
players are often regarded as degenerate losers by some hackers.
Why is Verant so paranoid? Why do they suspect everyone of trying to swindle
them? Bc there are creeps who will do it. That's why.
luv,
-Su

> I don't know who would want my EQ account? If someone wanted to hack into
> my system I think they would want other information than my account?
Maybe
> I am missing something about the frequency which this happens.
>
> On the issue of customer service this type of statement is poor and might
> have been worded this in a more customer friendly way. ( or just hire more
> staff to help the customer) but this would be good customer service.
